title: Domenick J. Braccia
text:
About Me

I use bioinformatics, data science, and machine learning to study human health and disease. I am particularly interested in improving outcomes for patients with autoimmune disease.
I am currently a Scientist in Computational Biology at Cabaletta Bio.
You can find links to my work on Google Scholar and Github.
